text: Kona kona ihudi tara laksya theke kathara mora ghuriye neya ebam bale, amara sunechi kintu aman'ya karachi. Tara aro bale, sona, na sonara mata. Mukha bamkiye dbinera prati tacchilya pradarsanera uddese bale, rayenaâ€™ (amadera rakhala). Athaca yadi tara balata ye, amara sunechi o man'ya karechi ebam (yadi balata, ) sona ebam amadera prati laksya rakha, tabe ta'i chila tadera jan'ya uttama ara seta'i chila yathartha o sathika. Kintu allaha tadera prati abhisampata karechena tadera kupharira daruna. Ata'eba, tara imana anache na, kintu ati alpasankhyaka.
